LanguageData.SadjuukResearchAA.label: Research Spot
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchAA.description: Beauty : 2 A place where primitive experiences can be conducted.
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchBA.label: Research Desk
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchBA.description: Beauty : 12 A wooden desk to comfortably focus on your research with serenity.
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchCA.label: Research Station
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchCA.description: Beauty : 2 Power : 150W A research Station equipped with IT and measurement tools.
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchUpgradeAA.label: Jade Calendar
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchUpgradeAA.description: Beauty : 16 Research Upgrade : A primitive calendar, giving the position of the stars and seasons.
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchUpgradeBA.label: Research library
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchUpgradeBA.description: Beauty : 12 Speed : +6% Research Upgrade : A large library collecting acquired knowledge.
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchUpgradeBB.label: Globe
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchUpgradeBB.description: Beauty : 12 Speed : +6% Research Upgrade : A globe focusing on geography and geology.
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchUpgradeBC.label: Small Library
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchUpgradeBC.description: Beauty : 12 Speed : +3% Research Upgrade : 2 of these small libraries can be used with a research space. A small library very rich in knowledge
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchUpgradeCA.label: Blueprint Table
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchUpgradeCA.description: Beauty : 2 Power : 50W Speed : +10% Research Upgrade : The Blueprint Table allows to design machines with great precision.
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchUpgradeCB.label: Archival Cabinet
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchUpgradeCB.description: Beauty : 2 Speed : +2% Research Upgrade : 2 of these archival cabinets can be used with a research space. An efficient way to store the files and plans resulting from the research carried out.
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchUpgradeCC.label: Computer Installation
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchUpgradeCC.description: Beauty : 2 Power : 150W Speed : +10% Research Upgrade : 2 of these installations can be used with a research space. A complete IT installation dedicated to all types of research.
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchUpgradeCD.label: Computer Server
LanguageData.SadjuukResearchUpgradeCD.description: Beauty : 2 Power : 150W Speed : +5% Research Upgrade : 4 of these archival cabinets can be used with a research space. An advanced computer server allowing billions of algorithms to be linked.
